name: pulley
description: A pulley, possibly from a conveyor

name: rubber belt
description: A belt, possibly from a motor or a conveyor

name: PLC(Programmable logic controller.)
description: A PLC, or programmable logic controller.  A very basic computer that is designed to withstand factory environments(heat, dust, physical impact, and electrical noise), and is used for industrial or electromechanical purposes.
